replies.body: Shame they didn't win the B O 5. I would love any other team to win other than skt again.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=v6IVqn2A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-22T03:34:20.920+0000)
>
> Shame they didn't win the B O 5. I would love any other team to win other than skt again.

We still have samsung galaxy as our last chance for that

> [{quoted}](name=gravityhacker,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=v6IVqn2A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-22T04:39:21.779+0000)
>
> We still have samsung galaxy as our last chance for that

I'd rather a different team win every year, i mean, when its just korean teams you may as well make it the korean pro scene rather than worlds. they should ahve one team from at least every server. not 3 NA and korean teams, and the occasional wildcard team.

Koreans would still win. It would be nice to see an OCE team at worlds but there is light years work needed. OCE are good at team fighting, but the three main things they lack are

1) Macro understanding of war strategy
2) Tenacity and resolve
3) Discipline and respect for coaches

> [{quoted}](name=gravityhacker,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=v6IVqn2A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-22T04:39:21.779+0000)
>
> We still have samsung galaxy as our last chance for that

I personally feel like Koo were our best shot. I don't feel like Samsumg will get close. Maybe at best they will take 1 game from SKT.
